scripts.check-formatting: prettier -c './*.json' ./.prettierrc ./README.md ./pyproject.toml && poetry run isort hooks --check && poetry run yapf -rd hooks
scripts.format: prettier -w './*.json' ./.prettierrc ./README.md ./pyproject.toml && poetry run isort hooks && poetry run yapf -ri hooks
scripts.qa: yarn mypy && yarn pylint && yarn check-spelling && yarn check-formatting
